<S%H8245>"Watch<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> [them] <S%H5704>until<s%> you <S%H8254>weigh<s%> [them] <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8269>leading<s%> <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and the <S%H8269>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households] of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> [in] the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
